1):\n                if nums[i + 1] < nums[i]:\n                    y = nums[i + 1]\n                    if x == -1:\n                        x = nums[i]\n                    else:\n                        # second occurance, break\n                        break\n            return x, y\n        \n        def recover(node: TreeNode, cnt: int):\n            if not node:\n                return \n            if node.val == x:\n                node.val = y\n                cnt -= 1\n            elif node.val == y:\n                node.val = x\n                cnt -= 1\n            if cnt == 0:\n                return\n            recover(node.left, cnt)\n            recover(node.right, cnt)\n            \n        nums = inorder(root)\n        x, y = find_two_swapped(nums)\n        recover(root, 2)\n            \n            \n            \n            \n            \n                \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"recover-binary-search-tree","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
